content:
Getting Started with the MarketRaker API

Welcome to the MarketRaker API, a powerful tool designed to provide trading indicators and insights for various markets. By using our API, you agree to be bound by our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. Please review them carefully before proceeding. Additionally, ensure you have the following ready:

  • Application ID: Obtain a valid application ID from the API URL integration page. This ID uniquely identifies your application and is required for all API requests.
  • Signing Key: Your unique signing key also obtained from the API URL integration page is used to sign requests to the MarketRaker API. Keep your signing key secret and do not share it with anyone, as it verifies your identity.
    Note: MarketRaker does not store your signing key. If you lose it, you will need to generate a new one.
  • API Credits: Ensure you have sufficient API credits to make requests.
